reports_financeRealization_title: Report on the sale of goods
reports_financeRealization_description: Report on the sale of delivered and returned goods for the month. Cancellations and non-purchases are not included.
reports_financeTransactionList_descripti: Returns detailed information on all charges.
reports_financeTransactionTotals_descrip: Returns the totals of transactions for the specified period.
reports_financeTransactionTotals_columns: Total cost of goods and refunds in a given period.
Total cost of goods and refunds
The amount of the commission that was withheld when the product was sold and returned when it was returned.
Cost of services for processing shipments, order assembly, highway and last mile.
The cost of the return trunk, processing refunds, cancellations and non-purchase of goods.
The cost of the return trunk
The cost of additional services not related directly with deliveries and returns of goods.
Charges for delivery and refunds when working under the scheme "Delivery at the seller's choice".
reports_financeOverview_description: Contains the final financial component, including net profit.
